snippet: At Art Basel Miami, the snapping of so-called art selfies had escalated to near epidemic proportions.
abstract: Attendees of Art Basel Miami Beach 2014 take advantage of the selfie phenomenon, posing in front of works by their favorite artists.
lead_paragraph: At Art Basel Miami, the snapping of so-called art selfies had escalated to near epidemic proportions.

headline.main: Perfecting the Art Selfie in Miami
headline.print_headline: Perfecting the Art Selfie in Miami
